description: Main entry point and root widget for the Flutter 2048 game app. Sets up theme, routing, and main layout components such as score bar, control bar, and game board.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app, provides theme and game state to child widgets.

classes.name: _RootScaffold
classes.description: Main scaffold widget that creates gradient background, app bar, and lays out game UI components.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes and runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _RootScaffold.
